name: e*merge*
description:
control two characters at once as you make your way through the dungeons of a castle, clearing it of monsters (and crates, of course). continue progressing to become stronger (...together)!

Requirements

  • Keyboard
  • Mouse

Controls

the left character moves with the WASD keys (or ZQSD for those with AZERTY keyboards). they attack with a sword when you press the left shift or space button. with their slash, they are able to parry arrows shot by enemies. but be careful, because some enemies are able to parry as well. this character has two health.

the right character moves with the mouse: right click somewhere to move there. they shoot arrows in whichever direction you left click towards. this character only has one health.

whenever the players touch, they merge into one. in this state, you can shoot arrows and sword slash with the same keys as before. as soon as you are hit while merged, you will unmerge and will not be able to merge again until the next room.

by pressing the escape key, you can open the options menu. this will reset the room.

in the options menu you can change volume and keyboard type.

this game has only been tested on windows 10 and in the browser.

this game is a submission to the Brackeys 2021.1 game jam, with the theme "stronger together."
